extension.name: Norwegian Tokens
extension.description: The following tokens are provided by this extension: * {norsk.today} e.g.: 24. Januar 2018 * {norsk.pronoun_degdere}: deg/dere * {norsk.pronoun_degdere_capital}: Deg/Dere * {norsk.pronoun_dinderes_capital}: Din/Deres * {norsk.pronoun_dinderes}: din/deres * {norsk.pronoun_dinederes}: dine/deres * {norsk.pronoun_dinederes_capital}: Dine/Deres * {norsk.pronoun_dudere_capital}: Du/Dere * {norsk.pronoun_dudere}: du/dere
